Due to inexplicable events beyond comprehension, all traces of the 
Samurai Archives Japanese History Page have been erased from 
the 'Free' server it was stored on - apparently by the company that 
runs the server itself - possibly a crash or some other unfortunate 
event. . . Fortunately copies of all of the HTML pages are safe, 
however only 70% or so of the images were saved . . . It may be a 
while before we can find space and upload to another free server 
somewhere else, however if anyone has any info on a good free server 
with over 50MB of space, feel free to email off list: 
kitsuno@...
Anyone who wants to look at the smoking remains feel free:
http://www.hn.org/samurai-archives/

thx
